text:
Kendra Wilkinson and Hank Baskett were spotted at their kid's sporting events on Sunday, despite the fact they recently split up.

Two days after Wilkinson announced she and Baskett were going their separate ways, they are keeping true to their word and putting the kids first. The soon-to-be exes were both spotted supporting each of their children at different sporting events over the weekend.

The reality TV star documented their family time together on her Instagram stories. Both Baskett and Wilkinson cheered on 8-year-old son Hank IV while he was playing hockey. They were both also present to watch their 3-year-old daughter Alijah play her very first soccer game. As it turns out, Hank is the coach of the little girl's team, so he was in a lot of the Kendra on Top star's social media posts.

Considering the couple had literally just announced they were ending their marriage, all eyes were on the family. However, Wilkinson and Baskett put their differences aside in order to be there for their children. In fact, according to an eyewitness, they even had a family outing after the sporting events at Menchie’s in Calabasas.

"Kendra and Hank took the kids to Menchie’s in Calabasas on Sunday afternoon. They were with Hank’s parents and the kids seemed excited and happy go lucky. They stopped to throw pennies in to the fountain and make wishes. Kendra seemed a little bit somber and had her head down. But she was chatting with Hank and smiling when the kids talked to her. When it was time to go, Kendra and Hank discussed their plans for a minute and then said goodbye casually. Kendra took the kids and Hank left with his parents," a source told E! News about the family’s outing.

Kendra Wilkinson and Hank Baskett’s relationship has definitely been put to the test over the years. Once again they find themselves in unchartered territory as they learn to co-parent amidst their divorce. If their recent actions at the kid's sporting events are any indication, each appears to be willing to put their differences aside for the sake of the children. As the divorce proceeds, here is hoping they can maintain that peaceful coexistence for Hank IV and Alijah.
title: Kendra Wilkinson And Hank Baskett At Kid’s Sporting Events Despite Split

meta_data.description: Kendra Wilkinson and Hank Baskett both attended their son's hockey game and their daughter's soccer game this past weekend.
